posts.message: Guys I need help in JS. I have a string "912,501.32" I'd like to wrap every number with a span. please help :S

Hey guys,

I would like to take your opinion about something. We would like to arrange a 1 Day workshop online and I would like to see if you guys would like the idea and we can all benefit from each others.

I would like to take the initiative. The Subject of the Topic is: "How to develop Your Project the correct way"

Since we are all based around the world we all share the weekend only on Saturday.

Please suggest a time That we all/Most of us can be available.

We will use Google Hangout. and Please leave a comment if you are interested in the idea or if you will be able to attend the Workshop.

Thanks,
Mohamed
